Title: Relates to establishing a new classification for properties held in condominium and cooperative form for assessment purposes
Summary: Relates to establishing a new classification for properties held in condominium and cooperative form for assessment purposes.
LawCode: Amd §§1802, 1805, 467-a, 499-aaa, 499-aaaa, 522, 523-b, 701 & 720, RPT L; amd NYC Ad Cd, generally; amd §§163 & 164-b, NYC Chart
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, the administrative code of the city of New York and the New York city charter, in relation to establishing a new classification of properties for properties held in condominium and cooperative form for assessment purposes
